alert.note: Alert for Central Interior (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 08 at 3:32PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR AN ICE JAM NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam continues. * WHERE...The Tanana River at Manley Hot Springs. * WHEN...Until 600 PM AKDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Flooding is occuring in Manley Hot Springs with many roads and structures still impacted by high water levels. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 328 PM AKDT, the ice jam which was located 12 miles downriver from Manley Hot Springs released late Sunday morning, and water levels are currently falling. Water is still inundating much of the community but will gradually recede over the next 24 hours. Some low-lying areas will likely have standing water remaining well into the upcoming week.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
